bibl.title: Latin Cursive Documents from Vindolanda, south of Hadrian's Wall. (Summary.)
bibl.note: Full publication is planned in one of the volumes on the excavations at Vindolanda.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the XIV International Congress of Papyrologists

Full publication is planned in one of the volumes on the excavations at Vindolanda.
